categories: Category:Star Wars: Build Your Own R2-D2

nodes.text: Star Wars: Build Your Own R2-D2 20

Star Wars: Build Your Own R2-D2 20 is the twentieth issue of the Star Wars: Build Your Own R2-D2 published by De Agostini. It came with a head frame, sensor, and leg parts for the buildable R2-D2 and contained the articles "Building a Better Droid", "EV-series supervisor droids" and "Developing Robot Mobility".
